message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This unique item is worth $800,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price tailored to our relationship. My proposal is to extend this opportunity to you at $750,000. This is a significant discount, reflecting my desire to see such a valuable asset go to someone who appreciates its worth as much as you do. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
